events.message: I recently received my order but the item is not as described and I would like to request a refund for the purchase.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message concerning dissatisfaction with the product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with your purchase. I am here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the item so that I can process your refund?
My order number is 123456. The product did not match the description on the website, and it doesn't function as expected.
Thank you for the details. We can issue a full refund once you return the product. I will send you the return instructions right away.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and the clear instructions for the return.
The refund process has been initiated. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
We are checking to confirm if you have received your refund or if you need any further assistance regarding the return.
I received the refund today. Thank you for managing this so smoothly and for your support throughout.
We are glad to hear the refund was received. Closing this case now, and please contact us again if you need any further help.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is very valuable.
